---
title: "Target-Supported Features"
layout: docs
permalink: /docs/handbook/0.5.2/features
oneline: "Which features are supported by which target?"
version: "0.5.2"
preamble: >
---
| Target/Feature  | Banks & Multiports | Clock Synchronization | Federation |
| :------------- | :----------: | :-----------: | :-----------: |
|  **C** | Y | Y | Y |
| **C++** | Y | N | N |
| **TS** | Y | N | N |
| **Python** | Y | N | N |
